SEARCH
Package edu.ntnu.idi.idatt.models

Class CookbookTest

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idi.idatt.models.CookbookTest
@DisplayName("Test cases for the Cookbook class") class CookbookTest extends Object
Test class for the Cookbook class.

Performs the following tests:

  • Positive tests:
    • that the cookbook can be created with no recipes, and that the list of recipes is empty.
    • that the accessor method getRecipes returns the list of recipes, even if the list is empty.
    • that the accessor method getRecipe returns the recipe with the provided name.
    • that the method addRecipe adds a recipe to the cookbook, and that the list of recipes is sorted alphabetically by name after adding the recipe.
    • that the method removeRecipe removes a recipe from the cookbook.
    • that the method sortRecipes sorts the recipes in the cookbook in ascending alphabetical order, by name.
    • that the method removeAllRecipes removes all recipes from the cookbook.
  • Negative tests:
    • that the method getRecipe throws an IllegalArgumentException when the name of the recipe is null or blank.
    • that the method getRecipe throws an IllegalArgumentException when no recipe with the provided name is found.
    • that the method addRecipe throws an IllegalArgumentException when the recipe is null.
    • that the method addRecipe throws an IllegalArgumentException when the recipe already exists in the cookbook.
    • that the method removeRecipe throws an IllegalArgumentException when the recipe is null.
    • that the method removeRecipe throws an IllegalArgumentException when the recipe does not exist in the cookbook.
